naslov: Kuća: Ekskluzivno opremljena vila 550 m2 i ost. na parceli 2800 m2 (prodaja)
opis: *** EKSKLUZIVNO OPREMLJENA VILA 550 M2 SA PRATEĆIM OBJEKTIMA I GRAĐEVINSKIM ZEMLJIŠTEM, SMJEŠTENA U PODNOŽJU ZAPADNOG DIJELA MEDVEDNICE!! *** Zagreb, Gornji Stenjevec, prodaje se ekskluzivno opremljena vila ukupne površine 550 m2 na parceli 2800 m2, smještena na mirnoj i idiličnoj mikrolokaciji u okruženju prirode, a opet nedaleko od glavne prometnice Aleje Bologne.  Osim stambenog objekta- vile, na parceli se nalaze i prostrana sjenica, garaža sa kupaonom, drvarnica, sušiona i natkrivena profesionalna pečenjara kao zasebni objekt, a u samoj vili se nalazi još jedna grijana garaža za dva automobila. Preostali dio okućnice čine dječji park, asvaltirani kolni ulaz i vrt. Istaknuli bi da je dio okućnice (900 m2) u građevinskoj zoni stambene namjene te postoji mogućnost izgradnje još jednog stambenog objekta kao i mogućnost izgradnje bazena. Vila je opremljena ekskluzivnim stilskim namještajem, ekskluzivnom masivnom untarnjom drvenom stolarijom, talijanskom keramikom visoke klase, masivnim parketima visoke klase, kućanskim aparatima, električnim podizačima roleta, luksuznim sanitarijama. Sastoji se od prizemlja, 1. kata, 2. kata i potkrovlja i koncepirana prema sljedećem: PRIZEMLJE - konoba opremljena šankom, masivnim drvenim stolom, krušnom peći i ost.; - hodnik koji povezuje prizemlje sa ostatkom kuće - luksuzno uređena kupaona sa saunom, hidromasažnom kadom, toaletom i ost. - grijana garaža za dva automobila 1. KAT - glavni ulaz sa prostranim hodnikom - kuhinja sa blagavonom i prostranim dnevnim boravkom sa kaminom - zimski vrt - balkon - kupaona - ostava 2. KAT - prostrano predsoblje - dvije spavaće sobe od kojih jedna ima vlastiti garderobni prostor - prostrana kupaona - natkriveni balkon i terasa POTKOROVLJE -dvije sobe i kupaona. Objekt je održavan i u odličnom je stanju. Grijanje je plinsko etažno. Vlasništvo je 1/1 i bez tereta. Osim za stanovanje, objekt ima veliki potencijal i za turističku djelatnost luksuznog smještaja, s obzirom na vrhunsku opremu i sadržaj. Mogućnost kupovine kreditom. *** EXCLUSIVELY FURNISHED VILLA OF 550 M2 WITH ACCESSORY BUILDINGS AND CONSTRUCTION LAND, AT THE FOOT OF THE WESTERN SIDE OF MEDVEDNICA MOUNTAIN!! *** Zagreb, Gornji Stenjevec area, an exclusively furnished villa is for sale, with a total area of 550 m2 on a land plot of 2800 m2, located in a quiet and idyllic micro-location surrounded by nature, yet not far from Aleja Bologna main road. In addition to the residential building - the villa, there is also a spacious gazebo, a garage with a bathroom, a woodshed, a smokehouse and a professional grill shack as a separate structure, while the villa itself has another heated garage for two cars. The area around the house also features a park for children, an asphalted driveway and a garden. It should be noted that a portion of the garden (900 m2) is in the construction zone for residential purposes, and there is a possibility of building another residential building, as well as of building a swimming pool. The villa is furnished with exclusive style furniture, exclusive massive wooden internal joinery, high-class Italian ceramics, high-class massive parquet floors, household appliances, electric shutter lifters, luxury sanitary ware. It consists of ground floor, 1st floor, 2nd floor and attic and is designed as follows: GROUND FLOOOR - tavern equipped with a bar, massive wooden table, bread oven, etc.; - hall that connects the ground floor with the rest of the house - luxuriously decorated bathroom with sauna, hydromassage bathtub, toilet, etc. - heated garage for two cars 1st FLOOR - main entrance with a spacious corridor - kitchen with a dining room and spacious living room with fireplace - winter garden - balcony - bathroom - pantry 2nd FLOOR - spacious hall - two bedrooms, one of which has its own wardrobe space - spacious bathroom - covered balcony and terrace ATTIC -two bedrooms and a bathroom The building is well maintained and in an excellent condition. The heating is gas-fired. Ownership is 1/1 without any mortgages. In addition to residential purposes, the building has a great potential for luxury tourism, given its top-notch equipment and facilities. Option of purchase with bank loan available.
